name: @local/smart-llm-router
description: Smart LLM router for OpenClaw - automatically routes to the most cost-effective model

scripts.test-router: npm run build && npx tsx test-router.ts
scripts.install-plugin:
npm run build && npm link && echo '

scripts.reinstall: npm run uninstall-plugin ; npm run install-plugin
